column4: I was trying to install AWN but I got this error "E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), is another process using it?

2007-11-02T22:58:00.000Z	rico	Pancakes	are you running update manager in the background?
2007-11-02T22:58:00.000Z	rico	Pancakes	or another instance of apt-get / dpkg / etc?
